Objective
One place to find all the events happening in your campus.
Description:
How often you miss an event at your university?? As there are many diverse programs happening on the campus all through the semester, it is difficult to find a single platform to find all those events. Students currenlty pursuing their bachelors or masters degree though very talented are not able to expose their talents as they are not able to keep track of all the events happening within and outside college. Our App provides a platform for students to find all the events. It gives all the details of the events like Venue, Date and time of occurance, Once registered, it'll be stored in user's profile. Apart from that, once the user creates a profile on this App, he can store the events of his interest(favourites) even without registering. To ease the user experience we have provided filters to search. So based on the user's area of interest, only related events will be displayed.
